title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide recovery rebates to certain individuals receiving Social Security or certain veterans benefits.
content: Universal Economic Stimulus Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow social security or veterans benefits recipients with earned income less than $3,000 a $300 refundable tax credit in 2008. Reduces the amount of such credit by 5 of the amount by which the taxpayer's adjusted gross income exceeds $75,000.
